allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add source site filter and auto-fix unknown sources from URLs

- Add Source filter dropdown to the UI \(LinkedIn, Indeed, S1Jobs\)
- Add FixUnknownSources\(\) method to infer source from job URL
- Auto-fix unknown sources on app startup
- Auto-infer source when adding new jobs
- Add API endpoint POST /api/jobs/fix-sources
- Improve LinkedIn auto-fetch filter to check Source property

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Welcome to the Jungle \(WTTJ\) browser extension and support

- Create WTTJExtension browser extension for extracting jobs
- Add WTTJ to source filter dropdown in UI
- Add WTTJ button to header with yellow brand color
- Add WTTJ icon and display name support
- Update URL normalization to handle WTTJ job URLs
- Add WTTJ to InferSourceFromUrl method

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add missing descriptions breakdown by source site

- Add NeedingDescriptionBySource dictionary to JobStats
- Update GetStats\(\) to calculate breakdown per source
- Display breakdown in stats banner with source icons
- Add CSS styling for source-specific breakdown items

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
